column1: This course aims at providing students with a basic understanding of the theory
and applications of multimodal human computer interaction (HCI) technologies.
Category A: Professional/academic knowledge and skills
1.  Understand the benefits of using multimodal HCI.
2.  Understand the basic theories in statistical learning.
3.  Have  basic  understanding  of  speech  recognition
4.  Understand the creative process when designing solutions to a problem.
